li.label: total authority
li.description: None could possibly think I have anything in common with the lower ranks here. All acknowledge my stature. It is fulfilling.

li.label: strong authority
li.description: I'm well-separated from the common folk. It's good to reign so thoroughly.

li.label: uncertain authority
li.description: My position feels like it's not properly acknowledged. I need to reign and establish my stature over the low people.

li.label: weak authority
li.description: I've had almost no opportunity to reign recently. One would barely even know I'm not a commoner. It's a serious problem.

li.label: no authority
li.description: My stature has been totally ignored! I'm forced to act as a commoner day in and day out. This is an outrage!
